original_text: The first agreement included rules about how people should worship God. It also spoke about a special place for people to worship God on this earth.
korean_text: 첫 언약에도 섬기는 예법과 세상에 속한 성소가 있더라

sentences.original_text: about how people should worship God
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 어떻게 하나님을 예배해야 하는지에 대한

sentences.original_text: It also spoke about a special place
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 또한 특별한 장소에 대해 말했습니다
